subject: Tennis
Sports Medicine
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Tennis is ever-more grueling and concussive as the swings get bigger and the athletes stronger. Why risk losing stars early by tempting them to break down in an ever-longer season?
snippet: Tennis is ever-more grueling and concussive as the swings get bigger and the athletes stronger. Why risk losing stars early by tempting them to break down in an ever-longer season?
